SA05rahppspu:4: RahPps_2 ākāśam iva nirlepāṃ niṣprapañcāṃ nirakṣarām /
SA05rahppspu:5: yas tvāṃ paśyati bhāvena sa paśyati tathāgatam //
SA05rahppspu:6: RahPps_3 tava cārye guṇāḍhyāyā buddhasya ca jagadguroḥ /
SA05rahppspu:7: na paśyanty antaraṃ santaś candracandrikayor iva //
SA05rahppspu:10: RahPps_5 sakṛd apy āśaye śuddhe yas tvāṃ vidhivad īkṣate /
SA05rahppspu:13: poṣikā janayitrī ca mātā tvam asi vatsalā //
SA05rahppspu:14: RahPps_7 yad buddhā lokaguravaḥ putrās tava kṛpālavaḥ /
SA05rahppspu:18: RahPps_9 vineyaṃ janam āsādya tatra tatra tathāgataiḥ /
SA05rahppspu:21: tvāṃ prāpya pralayaṃ yānti doṣā vādāś ca vādinām //
SA05rahppspu:22: RahPps_11 tvam eva trāsajananī bālānāṃ bhīmadarśanā /
SA05rahppspu:24: RahPps_12 yasya tvayy apy abhiṣvaṅgas tvannāthasya na vidyate /
SA05rahppspu:26: RahPps_13 nāgacchasi kutaś cit tvaṃ na ca kva cana gacchasi /
SA05rahppspu:27: sthāneṣv api ca sarveṣu vidvadbhir nopalabhyase //
SA05rahppspu:28: RahPps_14 ye tvām evaṃ na paśyanti prapadyante ca bhāvataḥ /
SA05rahppspu:29: prapadya ca vimucyante tad idaṃ mahad adbhutam //
SA05rahppspu:30: RahPps_15 tvām eva badhyate paśyann apaśyann api badhyate /
SA05rahppspu:31: tvām eva mucyate paśyann apaśyann api mucyate //
SA05rahppspu:33: sudurbodhāsi māyeva dṛśyase na ca dṛśyase //
SA05rahppspu:34: RahPps_17 buddhaiḥ pratyekabuddhaiś ca śrāvakaiś ca niṣevitā /
SA05rahppspu:35: mārgas tvam ekā mokṣasya nāsty anya iti niścayaḥ //
SA05rahppspu:37: kṛpayā lokanāthais tvam ucyase ca na cocyase //
SA05rahppspu:38: RahPps_19 śaktaḥ kas tvām iha stotuṃ nirnimittāṃ nirañjanām /
SA05rahppspu:39: sarvavāgviśayātītāṃ yā tvaṃ kva cid aniśritā //
SA05rahppspu:40: RahPps_20 saty evam api saṃvṛtyā vākpathair vayam īdṛśaiḥ /
SA05rahppspu:41: tvām astutyām api satīṃ tuṣṭūṣantaḥ sunirvṛtāḥ //
SA05rahppspu:42: RahPps_21 prajñāpāramitāṃ stutvā yan mayopacitaṃ śubham /
